mapper.select: select user_province,city_name,count(*)as user_count from (select c.date_id,c.imsi,c.city_id as user_city_id,d.province_name as user_province,d.city_name as user_city,c.city_name,c.county_name,c.cell_name,c.eci,c.ci from (select a.date_id,a.imsi,a.city_id,b.city_name,b.county_name,b.ci,b.eci,b.cell_name from (select * from ${tableName} where city_id not like '59%' and city_id!='null' ) a inner join cell4g b on a.eci=b.eci)c inner join city_lzs d on c.city_id=d.city_id) w where w.city_name='宁德' GROUP BY user_province,city_name

select user_province,city_name,count(*)as user_count from (select c.date_id,c.imsi,c.city_id as user_city_id,d.province_name as user_province,d.city_name as user_city,c.city_name,c.county_name,c.cell_name,c.lac,c.ci from (select a.date_id,a.imsi,a.city_id,b.city_name,b.county_name,b.ci,b.lac,b.cell_name from (select * from ${tableName} where city_id not like '59%' and city_id!='null' ) a inner join cell2g b on a.lac=b.lac and a.ci=b.ci)c inner join city_lzs d on c.city_id=d.city_id) w where w.city_name='宁德' GROUP BY user_province,city_name
SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE table_name =${tableName}

select sum(countNum) as userCount from (select cell_name,count(*) as countNum from ${tableName} w inner join cell4g c on w.eci=c.eci where city_name='宁德' and w.eci in ('110445072', '110445073', '110445074', '253523472', '253523473', '253529360', '253529361', '253529362') group by w.eci,cell_name) t

select sum(userCount)as userTotal from (select count(*) as userCount from ${tableName} a inner join cell2g b on a.lac=b.lac and a.ci=b.ci where a.city_id='593' and b.ci in('27071', '27072', '27073', '28821', '28822', '21641', '21642', '21643') and a.lac in ('22836', '22845' ) GROUP BY a.lac,b.ci) t

select top 5 * from (select cell_name,count(*) as countNum from ${tableName} w inner join cell4g c on w.eci=c.eci where city_name='宁德'and county_name='蕉城区' group by cell_name )t ORDER BY countNum desc
select top 5 * from (select cell_name,count(*) as countNum from ${tableName} w inner join cell4g c on w.eci=c.eci where city_name='宁德'and county_name='蕉城区' group by cell_name )t ORDER BY countNum asc
